Materials

Textbook

Randal E. Bryant and David R. O’Hallaron, Computer Systems: A Programmer’s Perspective, Third Edition (CS:APP3e), Pearson, 2016. Check the eBook.

Reference book

Brian Kernighan and Dennis Ritchie, The C Programming Language, Second Edition, Prentice Hall, 1988.
